msbt.message: Wow, , your home is looking great!I was already impressed, but somehow you manage to keep improving on it, !We might have to start calling it Castle soon!
When I came here to this island Resident Services was still just a tent, but look at it now! I guess most things have humble beginnings,
Have you had a chance to stop by Nook's Cranny since the remodel?It's bigger than ever, so there's bound to be lots more inventory on the shelves now, .
We have our own visiting scholar named Blathers here now to study our native wildlife, .Just think, someday I'll be able to say I was here when the field guide got written about !
Have you visited our museum yet, ?I'm so excited to have someplace to go learn about the natural history of , !
We're so lucky to have our very own tailors here, !Personally, I'm excited to watch an actual professional creating fashionable outfits up close.
Having an inclined path makes it easier for everyone to reach higher ground, so I'm grateful for that. Looks like we're all moving up in the world, !
That who moved here recently seems nice.Of course we know anyone who comes to has good taste, .
